packageJson.name: dev-404-page
packageJson.description: Internal plugin to add a 404 page in development with helpful information
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: load-babel-config
packageJson.description: Internal plugin that handles loading Babel configs
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: internal-data-bridge
packageJson.description: An internal Gatsby plugin which creates data nodes from internal data
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: prod-404
packageJson.description: Internal plugin to detect various flavors of 404 pages and ensure there's a 404.html path created as well to ensure compatability with static hosts
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: query-runner
packageJson.description: Internal plugin for running queries

packageJson.name: webpack-theme-component-shadowing
packageJson.description: An internal Gatsby plugin which handles configuring webpack to ensure theme components fall back from the user's site to theme modules.
packageJson.author: Chris Biscardi <chris@christopherbiscardi.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-source-filesystem
packageJson.description: Gatsby plugin which parses files within a directory for further parsing by other plugins

packageJson.description: Gatsby plugin which parses files within a directory for further parsing by other plugins

packageJson.name: gatsby-transformer-remark
packageJson.description: Gatsby transformer plugin for Markdown using the Remark library and ecosystem

packageJson.name: gatsby-remark-images
packageJson.description: Processes images in markdown so they can be used in the production build.

packageJson.name: gatsby-remark-responsive-iframe
packageJson.description: Make iframes in Markdown processed by Remark responsive

packageJson.name: gatsby-remark-prismjs
packageJson.description: Adds syntax highlighting to code blocks at build time using PrismJS

packageJson.name: gatsby-remark-copy-linked-files
packageJson.description: Find files which are linked to from markdown and copy them to the public directory

packageJson.name: gatsby-remark-smartypants
packageJson.description: Use retext-smartypants to auto-enhance typography of markdown

packageJson.name: gatsby-transformer-sharp
packageJson.description: Gatsby transformer plugin for images using Sharp

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-sharp
packageJson.description: Wrapper of the Sharp image manipulation library for Gatsby plugins

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-google-analytics
packageJson.description: Gatsby plugin to add google analytics onto a site

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-feed
packageJson.description: Creates an RSS feed for your Gatsby site.

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-manifest
packageJson.description: Gatsby plugin which adds a manifest.webmanifest to make sites progressive web apps

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-offline
packageJson.description: Gatsby plugin which sets up a site to be able to run offline

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-react-helmet
packageJson.description: Manage document head data with react-helmet. Provides drop-in server rendering support for Gatsby.

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-typography
packageJson.description: Gatsby plugin to setup server rendering of Typography.js' CSS

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-sass
packageJson.description: Gatsby plugin to handle scss/sass files

packageJson.name: gatsby-transformer-remark
packageJson.description: Gatsby transformer plugin for Markdown using the Remark library and ecosystem

packageJson.name: gatsby-remark-prismjs
packageJson.description: Adds syntax highlighting to code blocks at build time using PrismJS

packageJson.name: gatsby-starter-blog
packageJson.description: A starter for a blog powered by Gatsby and Markdown
packageJson.author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

packageJson.name: gatsby-plugin-page-creator
packageJson.description: Gatsby plugin that automatically creates pages from React components in specified directories

#   (JongGyun Park)

laziness -->

# Study

###      .

- Markup Language - HTML5

- CSS3

- CSS Preprocessor - Sass

- Javascript - ECMAScript 2015

- webpack

* React + redux

* node.js - express

* NoSQL - mongoDB(mongoose)

# Skill

**Front-End :** JavaScript, jQuery, React

**Back-End :** Java(with egovFramework)

**DataBase :** MariaDB, MySQL, Oracle

**Etc :** myBaits, iBatis

internal.content: # HTML ## Markup . HTML(HyperText Markup Language) XML(eXtensible Markup Language) ## doctype !! , . doctype quirks mode . **quirks mode** . doctype html DTD(Data Type Description) doctype html5 DTD ``` ``` | HTML5 | XHTML | | ----------------------------- | ------------------------------ | | | **** | | | **** | | | **** | | single quotations | single quotations | | | | , xhtml html . html5 ## head Tag ``` <title> </head> ``` head . ``` <head lang="ko"> ``` meta . ``` <meta charset="utf-8"> ``` ## Text Tag | strong Tag | b Tag | | ------------------ | ------------------------- | | | | | em Tag | i Tag | | ----------------- | ------------------------- | | | | ## a Tag target | | | | | -------- | --------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | | \_blank | | | | \_self | ! | | | \_parent | | | | \_top | | iframe top | ## SVG - Scalable Vector Graphics , **** . , . (d3.js, Raphael.js ...) ??? ?? ( 8, 2.3 ) SVG . [Modernizr](https://modernizr.com) js ``` if(!Modernizr.svg) { } ``` ## form form ``` <form method="" action="" autocomplete=""> ``` autocomplete default on ( ) ### label ``` <label><input ...></label> <label id="id"> <input id="id"> </label> ``` 2 . 2 id ### checkbox, radio button input label , label click action . ### input type="submit" , input type="image" src="" submit ### input type="reset" ### select ``` <select size="5" multiple> <option value="">1</option> <option value="" selected>2</option> <option value="">3</option> </select> ``` size , multiple ### textarea ``` <textarea cols="" rows=""> </textarea> ``` cols (px), rows ### button tag vs input type="button" ``` <button></button> <input type="button" value=""> ``` button ( ..) css ### button tag vs input type="image" button tag ### progress ``` <li> <label></label> <progress value="10" max="60"></progress> </li> ``` ### meter progress . ## html5 html4 div -> ** ** ! section article !! , ### `<header>` ### `<nav>` **** footer . , (header, section) ### `<section>` . h1~h6 section section . . section section ### `<article>` section article article section ### `<aside>` ### `<footer>` footer header, section, article ### `<address>` footer ### `<div>` div ? CSS !!!

# CSS - - ## css h2.bluetext - h2 class .bluetext h1, h2 - h1 h2 . **** ## Cascading Style Sheets ** ** 1. - - , - !important !important . - - **** > id > > - Cascading 2. - , ## CSS3 - - . . [W3C ](https://www.w3.org/Style/CSS/) - - prefix - | prefix | desc | | -------- | --------------------- | | -webkit- | , | | -moz- | , | | -o- | | | -ms- | | -webkit-column-count:3; , -moz-column-count:3; column-count:3 - [-prefix-free](https://leaverou.github.io/prefixfree) ## - - font-family - - @font-face - - CSS3 - . - [ ](https://fonts.google.com/earlyaccess) ``` ``` font-family . - font-size - - em, ex, px, pt.. . em M . 1em->16px; - px - font-weight - - font-style - - normal, italic .. - font ``` .h1 { font : } ``` - - color - - text-decoration - - none, underline, overline, line-through - a text-decoration:none; - white-space - - normal, nowrap, pre, pre-line, pre-wrap - white-space:nowrap; - - text-align - - start, end, left, right, center, justify, match-parent - justify - , , - text-justify - - text-align:justify; . - line-height - - , - text-overflow - - overflow:hidden; overflow:scroll, overflow:auto; && white-space:nowrap; . - text-overflow:clip; , text-overflow:ellipsis; - - list-style-type - li - nav . list-style-type:none; - list-style-image - li ## - background-color - background-image - background-repeat - background-position - - background-origin . - background-origin background-position - background-attachment - background-attachment:scroll; - background-attachment:fixed; - background-size - background - - font background ## - vs - - - - - | | | | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------ | | block level | `

,

~

,

      ,
      , ...` | | inline level | `, ,

[W3C ](https://www.w3.org/Style/CSS/) - - prefix - | prefix | desc | | -------- | --------------------- | | -webkit- | , | | -moz- | , | | -o- | | | -ms- | | -webkit-column-count:3; , -moz-column-count:3; column-count:3 - [-prefix-free](https://leaverou.github.io/prefixfree) ## - - font-family - - @font-face - - CSS3 - . - [ ](https://fonts.google.com/earlyaccess) ``` ``` font-family . - font-size - - em, ex, px, pt.. . em M . 1em->16px; - px - font-weight - - font-style - - normal, italic .. - font ``` .h1 { font : } ``` - - color - - text-decoration - - none, underline, overline, line-through - a text-decoration:none; - white-space - - normal, nowrap, pre, pre-line, pre-wrap - white-space:nowrap; - - text-align - - start, end, left, right, center, justify, match-parent - justify - , , - text-justify - - text-align:justify; . - line-height - - , - text-overflow - - overflow:hidden; overflow:scroll, overflow:auto; && white-space:nowrap; . - text-overflow:clip; , text-overflow:ellipsis; - - list-style-type - li - nav . list-style-type:none; - list-style-image - li ## - background-color - background-image - background-repeat - background-position - - background-origin . - background-origin background-position - background-attachment - background-attachment:scroll; - background-attachment:fixed; - background-size - background - - font background ## - vs - - - - - | | | | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------ | | block level | `

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and
Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove
right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named
